code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://localhost:5000';export const getUserBookings=async token=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/bookings"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data;};export const updateBooking=async(id,date,time,token)=>{const response=await axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/bookings/").concat(id),{date,time},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data;};export const deleteBooking=async(id,token)=>{const response=await axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/bookings/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data;};
